mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (name, username, email, password, address, phone, website, company) VALUES (#{name}, #{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{website}, #{company})
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET name = #{name}, username = #{username}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone}, website = #{website}, company = #{company} WHERE id = #{id}
